name: mora-scripts
description: Some scripts for my own use

scripts.release: cli/run npm version minor -m 'chore: bump minor version to pkg.version'
scripts.version: cli/puts '%cyou can run build and add build file to git in here' cyan
scripts.postversion: git push --follow-tags && npm publish && cli/run cnpm sync pkg.name
scripts.test: npm run test:run:base && npm run test:run:prefix && npm run test:libs:color
scripts.test:run:base: cli/run ENV='run test' node test/test-cli-run-base -v pkg.version --bar pkg.args.bar
